title: What should I study after high school in one of the Ivy Leagues if I want to be a businesswoman (since they do not offer undergraduate business courses)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Doing an economics major is a great way too go. I would recommend doing an eco course, or you can take any other course for that matter. Eco would help but if u are interested in something else feel free to take that. After you finish your bachelors then you go for MBA and that is more crucial to business.
Most schools offer Economics majors. Look at a copy/brochure for this major; the Colleges can offer you some reading material if you ask them.
